documents.document: @NinaKillen Right. I can see his point then. Calls for legislative change in that case.
@NinaKillen That's my point. Attendance just every Monday would be regular. Regularity can't be allowed to be the measure.
@NinaKillen But presumably 4 1/2 days every week is "regular attendance".
@NinaKillen The guy taking high court case argues 90% is good enough. Presumably because 90's a "big number"? But that's 1/2 day every week!
2/2 FredMetFormby: Temp. 10 °C, Hum. 85 %, Bar. 988 hPa, Rain 0.4 mm, Wind 6.9 mph SSE #Weathercloud
@NinaKillen Indeed. It's in here somewhere, but it's a very long list. https://t.co/BA6VR6bOLK
@NinaKillen He's said some staggeringly stupid things on Brexit. Trump-like, he'll say anything that resonates with his target audience.

@NinaKillen Doesn't he have to produce some sort of report saying why?

@NinaKillen Ha ha yes. :-) But that's a situation you can redress every 5 years. Brexit is for good, and so demands exceptional scrutiny.
@NinaKillen True. But as that result was obtained by misleading voters (£350 million/wk etc?) I feel Parliament has duty to correct that.
@NinaKillen And yet we demand integrity rather expediency from Teresa May.

@DeclanChellar @DonalPhelan "Just understand this. No one touches the swatches but me."
@DeclanChellar Ha ha, great! But even then those IT staff Agencies were scared of you. :-)
@DeclanChellar Indeed. But it's unlikely someone capable of such a cowardly attack would have taken you on.
@DeclanChellar You went out to find him, but unfortunately you couldn't. I clearly remember thinking that guy just had his luckiest break.
@DeclanChellar I recall once back in the Telford days hearing that a girl from our office was robbed just outside, and left quite shaken.

@DeclanChellar Come on Dec, we both know you're just a teddy bear.
A killer teddy bear, admittedly.
@grahamfarmelo Please, not this nonsense again. If there's really nothing, there's no manipulation. A "quantum field soup" is not nothing.

@virginmedia I've done that, it's correct. I was just pointing out you are sending out a contradictory message to what you've actually done.
@virginmedia But that's not what it says: "we've now *removed* Data Rollover 100MB from your package." The actual rollover was nearer 2GB.
@ghp1968 @virginmedia You've noticed too? :-) One of the most confusing sites around, appalling design. And very slow.
@virginmedia Got txt "OK, we've now removed Data Rollover 100MB from your package." Only been on this contract for 1 mth. Don't understand?
